articles.description: Maybe no social media apps does it for you – in which case, that'll be £379.99
articles.content:
Huawei has confirmed UK pricing and availability of its latest mid-range blower, the P40 Lite 5G, a pared-down version of this year's flagship with tapered price tag to match starting at £379.99.
Driving this phone is Huawei's octa-core HiSilicon Kirin 820 p… [+1939 chars]

articles.title: The Oculus Quest is back in stock in the US - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: The 64GB and 128GB models of the Oculus Quest are finally back in stock over in the US, and you can buy it direct from Oculus or Amazon US.
articles.content:
Fed up of being locked down in your home, but don’t want to risk your health by stepping outside? Get yourself an Oculus Quest and trick your eyes into thinking you’re somewhere else, because it’s finally back in stock over in the US.
It’s been weeks since O… [+1451 chars]

articles.title: Sony’s 8K TV pricing is tempting, but can it take on Samsung? - TechRadar
articles.description: Sony’s single 8K TV may be crowded out by the competition
articles.content: The Sony Z8H is set to be the companys flagship 8K TV for 2020 unavoidably, given its the only Sony 8K TV releasing this year. Confirmation of its pricing, though, brings up the awkward question of how the Z8H can compete with the multiple 8K sets already bei… [+2891 chars]

articles.title: Superb rare MGB heading to auction - Motor1 UK
articles.description: The Market will be offering a 1981 MGB GT V8 SEC online.
articles.content:
The MGB is one of Britain's most beloved sports cars. When in mint condition, they're well sought after, but perhaps none are as well sought after as this one.
Later this month online classic car auctioneer, The Market, is offering an extremely rare MGB GT V… [+2020 chars]
